quote_first: ‘At the third stroke it will be …’ He tiptoed out and returned to the control cabin. ‘… one … thirty-four and twenty seconds.’ The voice sounded as clear as if he was hearing it over a phone in London, which he wasn’t, not by a long way.
title: So Long, and Thanks for All the Fish
author: Douglas Adams

quote_first: He then went and had a last thorough examination of the emergency suspended animation chamber, which was where he particularly wanted it to be heard. ‘At the third stroke it will be one … thirty … four … precisely.’
title: So Long, and Thanks for All the Fish
author: Douglas Adams
